channel.title: Management on Foundries.io
channel.description: Recent content in Management on Foundries.io

item.title: Portainer Container Management on Linux microPlatform
item.description: At Foundries.io, we are constantly looking across the ecosystem for the best projects to complement the microPlatforms. One such project is Portainer. “Portainer is an open-source lightweight management UI which allows you to easily manage your Docker hosts or swarm clusters.”
